review: Was looking for a good Pediatric for my son, as we recently moved to India. My search was over after meeting Dr. Uday Kumar Sahu - he listens very patiently & gives sufficient time to speak about your baby health or any concerns. We were freely interact and able to express ours queries quite easily. I would strongly recommend Dr. Uday if anyone looking for good Pediatric nearby Kondapur.  Thanks Dr. Uday
reply_text: Dear Anil, you made an impact in my practice with appreciative words. It was pleasure meeting you and your family. Stay happy and I wish you never need me

review: Dr.Uday gave us enough time to explain and discuss my new born‚Äôs nursing problems, jaundice, vomitings etc He gave us 40 mins time to check our Boy‚Äôs health throughout and suggested good medicines which gave relief right away and also suggested preventive tips . Very helpful and helped relive our stress
reply_text: I love new born babies. This interest draws me to give my best. I am happy to hear about your baby‚Äôs relief. Enjoy your new parenthood. Stay connected for anything and everything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: 1. We have visited dr.Uday Kumar Sahu for my son  having a high fever.initially we explained that to control my son's high fever during the midnight before the dr's visit, we took over the counter medication paracetamol and antibiotics which he strongly said that it is like treating our son with poison without a consultant doctor, I believe every parent will do the same around midnight.2.upon checking the fever for my son dr suggested sponge bath in the dr's office, while we are doing the sponge bath to my son Dr came in middle *** *********** he argued that we are not doing the proper way, and his expectations are that parents should know everything like a dr. 3. He doesn't have the minimum patience to explain in the proper way but he spends time which is really a no use of talking *** ******* **** *********4. Later he prescribed the medication along with a few lab tests and he strongly said that antibiotics should never be taken in this high fever case, 5. Next day we followed up with lab results, and again he started arguing that lab reports are not correct even though those are certified labs and he will not consider our lab results.and dr expected us to visit only Vijay diagnostic which he didn't told us earlier.6. He also said that he can only treat kids of  educated parents and those should know  in and out of each and every medical term  in a very detailed way. ** ***** ** ********* **** ** ****** **** ** ** ***** ** **** *** ******** ****** *** ******* ** *** *********8. upon he said that he will never consider the lab results and upon insisting he prescribed an additional medicine which is surprisingly Antibiotics, which strongly contradict his own  points from 1 and 4.9. we are supposed to buy  the medicine from his office only.*** *** **** *** ***** **** ** * ** ***** **** ****** ******* *** ***** **** ****** ********* ** *** ****** **** ******** ************* ** ******* ******* ******* ****** ** ** **** *** ** ******* ********. only for consideration dr charged us Rs. 800 and gave us receipt of rs. 700 only. ******** * ******** ** ****** **** ****** ** ***** ************** ** ******* **** *** **** *** ** ******** **** *** ********* ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
** **** ***** **** ** ** ********* ****** *** **** we have met him for my son's treatment. My Son is 3 months old,  since few days  he is not able to take milk properly and crying most of the time when i try to feed him. We visited various hospitals like Fernandez, Rainbow but none of the doctors there were able to identify the issue.

Very rarely we will see doctors spending time with patients  but Dr Uday is an exception he spent 30 mins with us and he went through each and every details of my son to get a better understanding of the issue.

Dr Uday thoroughly checked my son and confirmed my son has mild infection in the stomach which is causing him discomfort while taking milk. Dr Uday suggested few medicines for 5 days and assured us that he will take milk from the 2nd dose of medicine and to our surprise my son started taking milk from the 2nd dose of medicine. We could see lot of improvement in my son within 5 days and now my son is able to take milk without any issues.

Hatsoff to Dr Uday for his timely diagnose and treatment.
reply_text:
Hello Gouthami
It gratifies me to alleviate discomfort in babies and see  parents get relief. Thank you for your appreciation. God bless you all with good health

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
First look ambience is pleasant and kid friendly. 
Staff good. 
Doctor is really calm, a great listener and personable. Explained everything to me in a very clear manner. Helped me to understand and wave off all the wrong notions I had in my mind. Makes sure you and him are on the same page and comfortable. He is not just somebody who would pen down list of medicines. Prescribes only if absolutely necessary.Great experience as a first timer.Couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better Paediatrician. Thank you!
reply_text:
Dear Ranveer
It is overwhelming to note that you are satisfied with my interaction. Yes, what I earn is your satisfaction. I am indebted to your feelings
